item.text: What's goin' on here? Where am I?
Cease your struggles. Those restraints are composed of adamantium, a metal which even your elephantine strength cannot break.
I'm gonna paint this whole room with your blood!
Though limited, your vocabulary is certainly colorful.
You can't do this! You're an X-Man!! You're an X-Man!!!
What of the Nexus? How soon until it is functional?
Synching four genomes is no small feat.
The energy generated by infusing these four mutant genes is far greater than had been guessed - perhaps even more than you could cope with.

You underestimate me, Beast. Once I wield the power of the four, I will be invincible. None will stand in my way and I will see to it the X-Men and the Brotherhood are utterly annihilated! Ha, ha, ha, haaaaaaa!
